greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum_{k=1..n} (-1)^tau(k)=n-2*floor(sqrt(n)).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=2,...,1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=2, 1000, a=n - 2*sqrtint(n); write("b065651.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 25 2009
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Dec 03 2001
